page.title: 12HOBBIES,COLLECTIONS
page.content: Today children like to make collections of many and varied things. Manufacturers of toys and games make it possible for{collections}to be easily obtained. The idea of collecting is a challenge,nice to look back upon,to add to or to talk to your friends about. Less than 12% did not have a collection at all,35% of collections were based on toys and 35% were based on pictorial material. Organized clubs were also popular as hobbies.{Cubs and Brownies}were attended by half the children whilst football,dancing,judo,swimming and riding commanded less interest.
